name: RiftLands
description:
RiftLands is a top down pixel sandbox adventure where you can explore the world, enter dungeons fight bosses and defend raids but also calm yourself creating a beautiful world.

Post Your Feed-Back In The Comments Or In This Form:

https://forms.gle/3j8efxMiagZCD8pj6

Any Feed-Back Is Appreciated !

//Controls

W,A,S,D : Move

E : Interact (Press E On The Tree Trunk To Craft A Crafting Table!!!!!!)

Tab : Open Inventory 

Left Mouse Click : Use Tool

Right Mouse Click : Use Super

Mouse Wheel : Change Selected Slot

L-Shift : Spawn A Random Mob (Testing Purposes)
